_88correct.description: Either whether this option is correct, or a regular expression that any correct response will match.

$eref.description: An object that occurs in place of a string as a property of a page or option, indicating that the property should be sampled from a bank.

___sampleFrom.description: Name of the bank to sample the property from.

$eref.description: An object that occurs in place of a string as a property of a page or option, indicating that the property should be sampled from a bank.

___sampleFrom.description: Name of the bank to sample the property from.

_88text.description: The text to display for a component of the experiment. Can also be a sampler.

_88page.description: A unit of the experiment to be showed at once, such as instructions or a question. The answer given for a page or its options will be shown separately.

$eref.description: The text to display for a component of the experiment. Can also be a sampler.

___tags.description: Mapping of tag names to tags. Has no effect on the running of the experiment. Pages needn't have the same tag names, but each tag name will form a column in the output.

additionalProperties.description: Pieces of information the experimenter wants to associate with pages in the analysis.

___freetext.description: Does this question have a text box option, as opposed to discrete choices? Defaults to false.

___condition.description: The experimental condition that this item belongs to. Used for constrained randomization, to keep items of the same condition from being adjacent.

___exclusive.description: Can only one of these options be chosen? Defaults to true.

___ordered.description: Are the options for this question ordered? Used to decide how to randomize the order of the options. Defaults to false.

___keyboard.description: Whether and how to use keybindings to choose options.

$eref.description: Unique identifier for a component of the experiment.
The feedback to display after this page/if this option is chosen. Can also be a sampler.
Array of filenames of images, audio, or video to be displayed on the page.
Either whether this option is correct, or a regular expression that any correct response will match.

_88sampler.description: An object that occurs in place of a string as a property of a page or option, indicating that the property should be sampled from a bank.

___sampleFrom.description: Name of the bank to sample the property from.

_88exchangeable.description: IDs of blocks that can swap positions with each other. For instance, if I have blocks 1, 2, and 3 and blocks 1 and 3 are exchangeable, the possible orders are 1, 2, 3 and 3, 2, 1.

_88id.description: Unique identifier for a component of the experiment.

_88counterbalance.description: IDs of blocks that can swap positions with each other. For instance, if I have blocks 1, 2, and 3 and blocks 1 and 3 are counterbalance blocks, the possible orders are 1, 2, 3 and 3, 2, 1.

_88resources.description: Array of filenames of images, audio, or video to be displayed on the page.

$eref.description: Object with fields describing an image, audio, or video file and how it should behave.

_88banks.description: A mapping from bank names to arrays of data.

___additionalProperties.description: Banks can contain any number of members with any unique strings as keys. But they must always have arrays of strings as values.

$eref.description: A list of pieces of information to be used as page or option properties.

oneOf.description: A piece of information to be used as a page or option property.
An object containing related pieces of information, each to be used as a page or option property.
